title: Need a 15-30 second animation/motion graphic with Redbull Can as main focus
snippet:
For the Redbull Animation competition, I need help with an animation. Work is super urgent, need something before 1st of November

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mYFJdrIyAFE


Quick storyboard suggestion? I think my idea below sucks but let me know how much it would cost WITHOUT VOICEOVER or audio; please refer to some old Redbull ads and if you've got a good storyboard idea feel free to add the hours to the quote.

Thanks

Phone call between an average college student asking his drug dealer for "some good shit"

Conversation goes a little like; sorry for how choppy my request is, wrote the below in 2mins:



<Scene of student in a parking lot on a phone or the same background as reference video>
*dials phone*

<Simple talking animation>
<Bubble with drug dealer in a car on the phone>
Student: Yoo how you been
Drug Dealer: Good, what can I do you for?
Student: What you got for me?
Drug Dealer: Somethin' good *wink*
Student: I'm at ______, come on down
Drug Dealer: See you in a  second
<Drug dealer pulls up in car, grabs money and gives him a Redbull can>
<Student is happy>
